contentrichtext.text: '''Victoria and Albert''' refers to Queen [[Queen Victoria|Victoria of the United Kingdom]] and her Prince Consort, [[Albert, Prince Consort|Albert of Saxe-Coburg-Gotha]] It may also refer to these things named in honour of the couple: *The [[Victoria and Albert Museum]] in London *[[HMY Victoria and Albert]], a Royal Yacht *[[HMY Victoria and Albert II]], a Royal Yacht *[[HMY Victoria and Albert III]], a Royal Yacht *[[Bhau Daji Lad Museum]], in Mumbai, formerly the Victoria and Albert Museum As well as the following television series: *''[[Albert and Victoria]]'' (1970-1971) *''[[Victoria & Albert (TV serial)]]'' (2001) ==See also== *[[Victoria & Alfred Waterfront]], in Cape Town {{disambig}}
